text: Oru Poi () is a 2016 Tamil Short film Starring Aaranya Kaandam (2011) and Joker (2016) fame Guru Somasundaram in lead role. Films Genre is Sci- Fi/Fantasy Drama. The film was produced by PKU productions and also funded by Srini Aravamoudane, Santhakrishnan.S, Jacthish and Kumaran.S. ==Cast== * Guru Somasundaram as Inba * Umpathy Ravichandiran as Raghav * Arunkumar Balakrishnan as Manickam * Dinesh Rajdane as Joseph ===Plot=== The base plot is a fantasy concept where the people die when they lie, this kind of situation occurs in our world. But the short film focuses on only 2 brothers – one who finds the cure to that situation and one who feels this situation is the right option to clean the world. The film will be a mixture of emotions and sci-fi concepts told in a non-linear screenplay. ===Launch=== The Short film was launched on October 1, 2016, in AVM preview theatre.
